title: Nickleback - dark horse(split tracks+covers)
description:
[img]Nickleback - dark horse(split tracks+covers)[/img]

    * Melodic rockers, Nickelback, return with their sixth album, Dark Horse. Responsible for delivering some of the heaviest pop hits of the decade, including &#039;Rockstar&#039; and &#039;How You Remind Me&#039;, Nickelback follow-up their multi-platinum selling fifth album All The Right Reasons with a hard-rocking release that is packed full of fist-pumping anthems.

      Dark Horse is the product of a long-awaited pairing between Nickelback and acclaimed producer Mutt Lange. Known for his work with prolific acts such as AC/DC, Mutt Lange injects Nickelback&#039;s established style with a heavy dose of crunching guitars and crashing cymbals. From the opening track, &#039;Something In Your Mouth&#039;, Nickelback pump-up their pseudo-metal pace with pounding power-chords and prominent lyrics. &#039;Burn It To The Ground&#039; and &#039;This Afternoon&#039; see deep-throated singer Chad Kroeger and his bandmates serve up party-animal machismo while &#039;Shakin&#039; Hands&#039; and &#039;S.E.X.&#039; are thunderous sonic shenanigans that flicker with grinding riffs. While the heavy rock tracks punctuate, a series of Nickelback&#039;s signature grand-gesture power ballads, including single &#039;Gotta Be Somebody&#039; and &#039;If Today Was Your Last Day&#039;, dynamically swell and stand prominent.

      The hard rock formula that cemented Nickelback as one of the 21st century&#039;s most successful bands remains intact throughout the album. While Mutt Lange offers snippets of the metal genre, Nickelback maintain their identity by executing their accomplished arena-rock ballads with notable passion. Every bit as catchy as their previous releases, Dark Horse is an accomplished collection of hook-laden rock songs that will ensure that Nickelback&#039;s rocketing commercial success continues to soar.

Track List	

 

   1. Something In Your Mouth
   2. Burn It To The Ground
   3. Gotta Be Somebody
   4. I&#039;d Come For You
   5. Next Go Round
   6. Just to Get High
   7. Never Gonna Be Alone
   8. Shakin Hands
   9. S.E.X.
  10. If Today Was Your Last Day
  11. This Afternoon
